page.title: 07THE LIFE BOAT AT APPLEDORE
page.content: There are twop lifeboats at Appledore The off-shore boat has a crew of 17 and the inshore a crew of 3. The inshore boat is on alert for 24 hours a day. There has been lifeboat at Appledore for 160 years. The present inshhore boat has been in service for 10 years and the offshore boat for 23 years. In that time over 70 lives have been saved, although 3 of the crew have been lost. The inshore boat is often called out, upto five times on one day, and 55 times in a week. The inshore boat is fast, inflatable craft, but the opffshore boat is a self-righting steel built boat.
